channel.title: Tutorial on Pepper's Serendipity
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial on Pepper's Serendipity

item.title: Export Maven Project with Dependencies
item.description: We want to export a Java-based project to an executable jar file. The process to export a jar file is not the same with a Maven Project which contains external denpendencies.

item.title: Install Docker and Create Images
item.description: Docker is a software platform that allows you to build, test, and deploy applications quickly. In this post, we are going to install Docker and create an image for the test environment.
